Uses of Class
org.cooperari.core.CThread

  • Packages that use CThread 
    Package Description
    org.cooperari.core
    Cooperari engine.
    org.cooperari.errors
    Cooperari error classes, related to aspects like runtime execution events (e.g., deadlock or race detection), invalid configuration options, internal errors, etc.
    org.cooperari.feature.data
    Support for data access yield points and race detection.
    org.cooperari.feature.monitor
    Yield point support for Java monitor operations and related deadlock detection.
    org.cooperari.feature.thread
    Yield point support Thread life-cycle methods.
    org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner
    Support for the "fork-and-join" thread runner.

    • Uses of CThread in org.cooperari.core

      Methods in org.cooperari.core that return CThread 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CThread CEngine.createNewThread(Runnable r, CUncaughtExceptionHandler excHandler)
      Tell the engine to start a new thread.
      CThread CThreadMappings.getCThread(Thread t)
      Gets the CThread instance that renders the execution of a given Thread, or the given thread instance if it is already a cooperative thread.
      CThread CEngine.getThread(int index)
      Gets thread created by the scheduler by creation order index.
      static CThread CRuntime.getThread(int index)
      Shortcut for calling CEngine.getThread(int) on the scheduler instance associated to this runtime.
      static CThread CThread.intercept(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint jp)
      Intercept thread, if a CThread.
      static CThread CThread.self()
      Get current thread object if the thread is cooperative, null otherwise.
      Methods in org.cooperari.core with parameters of type CThread 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CThreadMappings.associate(Thread t, CThread ct)
      Create a Thread-to-CThread association.
      void CTrace.record(CThread t, CTrace.EventType type)
      Record an event for one thread.
      void CTrace.recordStep(CThread t)
      Record a step for one thread.
      void CTrace.recordThread(CThread t)
      Record existence of thread.
